Context: The TLC (Tutoring Learning Centre) at George Brown College offers both in-person and online tutoring. Their contact email is tutoring@georgebrown.ca and phone number is 416-415-5000 ext. 4053. The hours of operation for on-campus locations are Monday to Friday, 10:00 a.m. â€“ 5:00 p.m. On-campus locations include Building C, Room 344 (enter through the Library) at 160 Kendal Ave., Toronto, Ontario M5R 1M3; Room 430A at 200 King St. East (SJA), Toronto, Ontario M5A 3W8; Building H, School of ESL, 3rd Floor, Room 367 (enter through the Library) at 341 King St. E., Toronto, Ontario M5A 1L1; and Room 538 (Library, Lower Level; access through the main Library entrance on 6th Flr) at 51 Dockside Drive, Toronto, Ontario M5A 0B6. For online tutoring, hours are daytime, evenings, and weekends. There are several TLC advisors: Alana Williamson (alana.williamson@georgebrown.ca), Linh Thai (Linh.Thai@georgebrown.ca), Amanda Watson (Amanda.Watson2@georgebrown.ca), and Michael Hill (mhill@georgebrown.ca). Some of their offices are located in Buildings C, H, and SHE 535.
